app.name: Survey
app.description: An app which asks the user to fill out some questions.

messageIds.introText:
# Appsemble survey
This app is a template app used to demo how a survey app could be created using [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app).
messageIds.reached: How did you reach this survey?
messageIds.knowsAppsemble: I already know what Appsemble is
messageIds.usedLowCode: Have you already used low code before?
messageIds.lowCodePlatforms: Which platforms low-code app platforms have you used before?
messageIds.usedYaml: Have you already used YAML before?
messageIds.finished: Thank you for taking our survey. You can try [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app) yourself to create your own app. This app can be cloned from [our store page](https://appsemble.app/apps/130).
